title: Just Eat's major shareholder alleges foul play behind Prosus bid
text:
Just Eat’s bidding war has been engulfed by a row between an aggressive US hedge fund and takeaway rival Delivery Hero.

Connecticut-based Cat Rock has accused Delivery Hero of “deliberately” plotting against Just Eat’s £9bn merger with a third delivery company, Takeaway.com.

Delivery Hero flooded the market with Takeaway.com stock, driving down the value of the all-paper deal for Just Eat shareholders as part of an orchestrated campaign to drive Just Eat into the clutches of a hostile bid by tech giant Prosus, Cat Rock claimed.

Delivery Hero “categorically refuted” the allegations, saying the stock sale was legally compliant and taken with “no knowledge of Prosus' contemplated offer to acquire...
description: Just Eat’s bidding war has been engulfed by a row between an aggressive US hedge fund and takeaway rival Delivery Hero.
